text:
Two I've enjoyed:

1. A paid test to write a pillar page for a real client of the company. Allowed me to feel compensated and take the time to make the piece really shine, including wire framing, etc. Before that, I gave an outline to provide my logic before writing.

2. I liked putting together a content marketing plan for an event for a role... it was something the company was struggling with after launching. Presenting it was also quite fun, tbh. And I did an outline, what I'd focus on, not specifics.
